infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos for your notes and profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to select images for your notes and profile.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to tag your notes with location and discover notes near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs location access to tag your notes with location and discover notes near you.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access to record voice memos for your notes.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take photos for notes and profile pictures.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to select images for notes and profile pictures.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos to your photo library.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to tag notes and discover content near you.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location in the background to tag notes and discover content near you.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to tag notes and discover content near you.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to select images for notes and profile pictures.
